name: QUIZ PRO! - General Knowledge (itch)
description:
QUIZ PRO! - General Knowledge Everyday science and world facts in this app on various categories supported everyday science and technology, physics, chemistry, biology, computer science, Mathematics, Riddles, IT , World Continents, World Largest & Smallest Oceans , Solar System , Islands , human anatomy , world important and historic events , current affairs, economies , wars , countries capitals and world organizations ,Manias quiz, UK History Quiz , US History Quiz, world geography, British history quiz, American History Quiz, NBA Quiz, Riddles quiz, Cartoon Characters Quiz, Halloween Quiz, Comic Books Quiz,Pedagogy Quiz,Holidays Trivia Quiz, Funny Trivia Quiz, Superheroes Quiz, Astronomy Quiz, European Geography Trivia Quiz, World Geography, Manias Quiz, Phobias and Fears Quiz, Astrology and Horoscope Quiz, Entertainment Quiz, Quantitative Reasoning, US Geography Quiz, World History Quiz, South Africa History Quiz, land resources and many many more categories with regular updates.

This quiz game is a great choice when you want to learn something, when you feel boring, or when you want to kill some free time. If you have some quizzes you can send the quizzes to us, and we will add them to this game and make an update.
